website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga 2 Pro hybrid ultrabook addresses some of the shortcomings of the previous iteration. But it is still a bit too heavy to replace both a clamshell notebook and a slate tablet.
cons: Only one USB 2.0 and one USB 3.0 port
Could use a bit more battery life
Some older apps have problems with scaling
Keys still exposed and clickable in tablet mode

customer_reviews.title: Not as described & not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: This item was bought as used but "very good" unfortunately the laptop has proven unstable. When booting it sometimes cannot locate the drive and other times randomly shuts down. Overall not fit for purpose. The item was dirty and stank of cigarettes. Definitely not as described and upsetting as a Xmas present. Item being returned for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: NoniTait

customer_reviews.title: An amazing Laptop/ Tablet/ Kickstand
customer_reviews.text: An amazing laptop for the money- handles everything I throw at it. I manage to get about 5-6 hours battery out of it too. the 3200x1800 screen is simply out of this world and I am finding that I use this laptop for everything. Some people complained that the wireless was hit and miss but I didn't have any problems even before I installed the wireless AC card. I have also put a 1TB Samsung SSD inside and it fly's! I cant sing its praises enough.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: ... very high resolution screen has turned-out to be a great draw-back: much of the graphic software I use ...
customer_reviews.text: The very high resolution screen has turned-out to be a great draw-back: much of the graphic software I use cannot handle this resolution, resulting in miniature fonts (I need to use a magnifying glass when I use Photoshop, Autocad and others). Otherwise, a very satisfying replacement for my workstation.
customer_reviews.author: Gad Giladi

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop and tablet with plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: A great laptop and tablet. Plenty of power for all my needs, which as a developer, are considerably more than the average. Battery life is great too. There is only major fault and that is the crazy high resolution of the screen (although the detail is amazing). In most cases it's fine, but I use quite a few programs that do not scale well and the menus and writing can get so tiny as to be very tricky to read. This can be resolved by reducing the resolution however if you are using a program for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 months and now dead
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 6 months and its suddenly died. Judging by another review its going to take 5 weeks to get fixed. They are only open 9 to 5 mon-fri. Not really suitable service level for a £1,100 laptop. Pretty poor.

customer_reviews.title: really not great for a £1200 laptop
customer_reviews.text: Mine needed a warranty repair after 10 months, and died after 15 months (mobo failure necessitating £850 replacement part), warranty is 1 year.. really not great for a £1200 laptop. During it's life the laptop was OK, although there were constant niggles: wifi drops out after a couple hours, mini hdmi connector was initially mounted incorrectly meaning it was inoperable (fixed during the first warranty repair, which was for a faulty keyboard), onelink dock can best be described as flakey. Pros were that the keyboard was amazing, processing performance was good, didn't get overly hot, pen input was ok but not mindblowing. For £1200 there are probably better options.
customer_reviews.author: DTscott

product_meta.title: Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro 13.3-inch QHD+ (3200 x 1800) Convertible Touchscreen Laptop (Intel Core i7-4510U 3.1 GHz, 8GB DDRIIIL RAM, 256GB SSD, Integrated Graphics, HDMI, Webcam, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Voice control, Windows 8.1) - Orange
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Orange

LENOVO YOGA 2 PRO
MULTI MODE LAPTOP WITH 360O FLIP AND FOLD
The Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro is a multi mode laptop with a super high-resolution Quad High Definition+ (QHD+) touchscreen that can fold back 360o, providing the ultimate flexibility between work and play. Thin, light and fast; it features YOGA Picks, which detects the laptop switching modes and recommends apps for each of the four usage modes -- Tent, Stand, Tablet and Laptop. 

The YOGA 2 Pro is for those who want their laptop to adapt to the way they use their device, for example, Laptop mode for focused tasks, Tablet for lighter, social browsing. Its 4 modes quickly allow the YOGA 2 Pro to adapt to any situation.

AT A GLANCE
 *  Up to powerful 4th generation Intel Core i7 processor 
 *  Preloaded with genuine Windows 8.1 
 *  13.3" super high-resolution QHD+ (3,200 x 1,800) IPS wide-view display with 10-point multi-touch technology 
 *  Up to 8GB DRR3 memory and up to 512GB fast SSD storage 
 *  Integrated Intel HD graphics
 *  YOGA Picks -- recommends an app for each mode 
 *  Backlit AccuType keyboard
 *  Lenovo Voice Control

CHOOSE YOUR MODE:
Tent Mode
This mode is unique to Lenovo and is ideal for utilising the intuitive 10-point touchscreen and using the Chef app.

Laptop Mode
Be as productive as possible when working, by placing your Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro into Laptop mode. The Phone Companion app is ideal for this mode.


Stand Mode
View images to share on social media using the Camera Man app. Fold your Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro back to place in Stand mode. 


Tablet Mode
Enhance your favourite pictures with the Photo Touch app. Place your Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro in Tablet mode to ensure entertainment on the go.


13.3” SUPER HIGH-RESOLUTION QHD+ DISPLAY AND MULTI-TOUCH 
The 13.3” super high-resolution QHD+ display can make you see the screen clearly from almost any angle with IPS wide-view technology. Enjoy greater accuracy with the 10-point multi-touch display, which is optimised to work with Microsoft Windows 8.1. Easily share files, photos, videos and more with tablet-style display with easy scroll and zoom functions. This innovative screen is sensitive and easy to use, making typing easier and offering a responsive gaming experience. 

ACCUTYPE KEYBOARD
The finger-friendly curved and back-lit key shape and ergonomic spacebar of the AccuType keyboard will work together to make it easier to type and reduce the number of typos, wherever you find yourself working. 

ULTRA-THIN. ULTRA-LIGHT. ULTRA-RESPONSIVE
 Packed with a powerful 4th generation Intel Core processor and preloaded with Microsoft Windows 8.1, the ultra-thin design of the Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro weighs 1.39kg (3.06Ibs) and is only 15.5mm at its thickest. The size, combined with the convenient Tablet mode makes the laptop very portable. 

LENOVO MOTION CONTROL 
Lenovo Motion Control lets you quickly flip through photos, PowerPoint slides and e-book pages, or skip music tracks playing on your laptop with simple gestures. 

LENOVO VOICE CONTROL
Meanwhile, Lenovo Voice Control allows you to execute simple commands by speaking to your Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro.

FAST MEMORY AND SSD STORAGE
On the Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro you'll find up to 8GB of fast DDR3L memory and up to 512GB of Solid State Drive (SSD) storage*. SSDs help you to access your files much faster than traditional hard drives, allowing faster application loading, as well as reduced start-up and shut-down times.
*Only available on selected models.

DOLBY HOME THEATER
Listening to music, films and games on your Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro will never be the same. With the Dolby Home Theater tools, you can experience riveting surround sound on your laptop PC. Dolby Home Theater technology enables the Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro to deliver a crisp, clear cinematic surround sound experience over its built-in speakers. It also adds clarity to sound from headphones. 

HD 720P WEBCAM
Take your web chats to the next level thanks to the built-in HD webcam. Your friends and family will be able to see you in clear 720p resolution, which means the picture will look good even on a large TV screen. The HD webcam also has enhanced low light capabilities, which means you'll always be looking your best whatever the lighting conditions.

MICRO-HDMI FOR BIG SCREEN ENTERTAINMENT
You can also enjoy your multimedia on the big screen by using the built-in Micro-HDMI out port to hook your laptop up to a HDTV, monitor or projector -- ideal for sharing your favourite videos with friends.

CONNECTIVITY AND SECURITY
The Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro comes with multiple wireless connection options. The built-in 802.11b/g/n Wi-Fi adapter will allow you to enjoy reliable connections to the internet, while Bluetooth 4.0 makes it easier to connect and share files with other devices. You can also connect a compatible USB 3.0 device, such as an external drive, offering transfer rates 10 times faster than a standard USB 2.0.

There are a large number of connectivity options available with the Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro:

 * 1 USB 2.0 and 1 USB 3.0 ports for connecting a wide range of peripherals--from digital cameras to MP3 players
 * 1 Micro-HDMI output for connecting to a compatible HDTV or home theatre receiver for uncompressed digital audio and video via a single cable
 * Audio Combo Jack (headphone and microphone)
 * 2-in-1 card reader (SD, MMC)

LONG-LASTING BATTERY LIFE
The Lenovo YOGA 2 Pro comes equipped with a long-life battery, so you can get the most out of your laptop PC between charges. You will be able to enjoy up to 9 hours* of online productivity and entertainment on-the-go before it needs to be topped up.
**Battery life is an estimated maximum. Actual battery life may vary based on many factors. 

CONNECT
Lenovo Cloud -- Imagine your files, everywhere. Lenovo's online storage and cloud utilities allow you the freedom to choose your device and location. With 5GB of free storage, you'll be able to secure and access your files wherever you are, on whatever machine you find yourself on.

DISCOVER
Exclusive Lenovo Content -- Discover all the amazing things you can do with exclusive tools from Lenovo. Learn how to get the most from your PC with Lenovo Companion or monitor your system performance with Lenovo Support. Lenovo keeps you up to date and delivers music, game and video content you can't get from anyone else.

With Lenovo Energy Management 7.0, choose between three main automatic settings - energy saver, normal, and turbo, or access further advanced settings options through the system settings menu. Protect and prolong the battery health using battery protection mode, and battery gauge. 

POWERED BY THE INTEL CORE I7 PROCESSOR
Get vibrant visuals, extraordinary battery life, and built-in security features with the 4th generation Intel Core i7 processor.
